item.description:
To all current RIRUG members and the local A/E and Construction community,

I am very pleased to announce and invite you to the kickoff Meetup of the newly revamped Rhode Island Revit Users Group.

This session, at the AIA RI Headqaurters in Providence, will focus on topics related to adoption of the Revit platform and will feature a brief panel discussion by local firms in various stages of implementation.

All are welcome from experts to those who are just evaluating the software. Also, while the group is focused on Autodesk Revit, users of all BIM platforms are very welcome. We expect a casual but informative discussion. Topics for future sessions will also be brainstormed.

This is a great opportunity to network and build the community of Revit and BIM users in RI. Please spread the word and I look forward to seeing you there.

Best,
Andy Keating / Principal - Stack Design Build
item.name: Challenges and Opportunities - Revit adoption and implementation
